text: Ben-Hadada yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “N fafe taan naxanye tongo i fafe yii, n ne raxɛtɛma nɛn i ma. I nɔɛ yulayaan nabɛ Damasi taani alo n fafe yi a rabama kii naxan yi Samari taani.” Axabi yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “N tan i beɲinma nɛn, i siga, koni fɔ en layirin xidi.” A yi layirin xidi e tagi, a yi a beɲin, a siga.
